author: Kim Lyons
title: Airbnb asks its hosts to provide 100,000 free rentals to first responders
description: Airbnb’s new program to provide lodging to first responders dealing with the COVID-19 outbreak asks hosts to donate their rentals without reimbursement from the company, and to bear the cost of following CDC-recommended cleaning protocols.
content:
The home rental platform is waiving fees but not helping hosts defray costs
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
Airbnb introduced a new program Thursday that its CEO called free housing for first responders dealing with the COVID-19 outbreak. The pr… [+4060 chars]
